transcript:
Tame je vyaktine call karyo chhe, e anya call par vyast chhe. Kripa kari pratiksha karo ke thoda samay pachhi prayas karo. Aap jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, vah anya call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kare ya kuch samay pashchat prayas kare. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.

Tame je vyaktine call karyo chhe, e anya call par vyast chhe.

Hello.

Hello.

Ji.

Ha sir, namaskar. Kaise hain?
Namaskar sir. Bas badhiya hun, boliye.
Sir, Alok Pandey bol raha hun main IndiaMART office se sir.
Ji.
Sir aapki complaint aayi thi na, buylead aapko nahi allocate ho pa rahi hai. Bhavyakant ka manager baat kar raha hun main.
Aapko buylead aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Nahi aa raha hai.
Sir buylead to aapke portal pe dikh raha hai sir ab.
Pahle nahi dikh raha tha, ab dekh raha hai sir. Do hi do hi dikh raha hai, dekh lijiye sir. Dekh raha hun main ek minute.
Nahi to bilkul matlab jo bilkul jo problem thi aapki ki ek bhi buylead aapko nahi dikh rahi thi, vo to resolve ho gayi na sir ki dikhne to lagi hai na ab? Ye puchh raha hun.
Kya?
Jaise pahle ek bhi nahi dikhti thi aapko, ab kuch buylead dikhne lagi hai dhire dhire.
Hai na?
Ji.
Jo product added hai sir, uske regarding aapko buylead dikhne lagi hai.
Aur abhi sir aapka ek aur buylead aapko aa rahi hai ya nahi aa rahi hai mujhe confirm kar dijiye ek baar dekh lijiye portal pe. Tab main isko close karunga.
Main la hi hun.
Kya sir?
Main la hi hun sir, nahi ho raha hai. Buylead utna nahi aa raha hai, jo chahiye rahega vo aa hi nahi raha hai. To sir main ye nahi kah raha hun sir utna aa raha hai. Bas aa receive ho raha hai ek baar main khud check kar leta hun offline pe.
Ji sir.
Hmm.
Sir kya hai sir aapke images nahi added hai products ki aapke.
Ha abhi matlab vo aisa hai ki matlab product vagarah.
Dhire dhire aap add kar rahe hain?
Ji sir.
Bas ki images nahi added hai, kuch bhi nahi added hai na photos, na images, isme aap product ke bare mein naam likha hai aur aapne price likha hua hai.
Ji matlab ki to matlab 40 product mein hai, baki 100 se vo 200 product mein hai, 200 se 250 product mein hai. Vo to upar product hai.
Ji sir.
275 product added hai, jisme mere khyal se bahut kam photo honge client jinke aapne photos images laga rakhe honge, hai na?
Ji sir matlab abhi kya hai 23 mein dekho 40 product ka ek photo vagarah nahi hai, baki sabka sabka hai.
Pahle sir jab maine check kiya tha aapka recent aur relevant wale page pe to buylead nahi show hota tha.
Ab aapko show ho raha hai kya ek baar check kariye. Laptop mein hai mujhe dikh raha hai sir yesterday ki sari buylead dikh rahi hai sir. Do buylead dikh rahi hai.
Ha ji. Dhire dhire matlab do do dikh raha hai drum unit aur ink cartridge ka.
Ji ji matlab pahle kya tha ki kuch bhi ab dekho dhire dhire aap jab consume karoge na, jab behavior banega aapka to apne aap dikhna start ho jayenge buyleads.
To fir khud dekho. Jaise jaise aap buylead use karoge vaise usko pata chalega system ko ki aapko dena kya hai, us hisab se aapko buylead bhejega aur aapko dikhega.
Hai na? Aur main bol raha hun isme category mere ko show nahi ho raha hai category. Product ka. Kaun si category nahi show ho raha hai sir?
Vo jo category vagarah likha rahta hai na jo toner cartridge vagarah.
Bataiye kaun si category nahi show ho raha hai? Aap product khol rakhe hoge na aapke samne hoga aapke.
Ji ji ji category matlab show hi nahi ho raha hai, jidhar buylead uthate hai na.
Hmm.
Vo to show hi nahi ho raha hai category.
Vo sab category dikh to raha hai sir. Dekhiye aap ek baar aaiye IndiaMART pe aapne khol rakha hota hai na?
Ha ji khol rakha hai maine vahi hum dekh rahe hai. Laptop mein khola hai mobile mein?
Computer laptop.
Thik thik thik aap buylead pe jaiye.
Ji.
Aapke paas relevant buylead ka tab khula hoga ek. Usme dekhiye category product ka option dikh raha hai sir. Drum unit, US tech, artist.
Abhi ye jo category aapne do dekh rahe hai. Ji ji.
Nahi nahi sare dikh rahe hai sir.
Do hi dikh rahe hai.
Sir us pe aap jaiye cursor leke jaiye.
Category mein. Us pe aap jo mouse ka cursor hai na usko leke jaiye.
Ha gaya gaya. Dekhenge sara dikhega aapko.
Dikh raha hai? Ek hi dikh raha hai, do hi dikh raha hai sir. Us pe cursor leke jaiye na sir.
Do hi sir main us pe hi gaya hun aur sab bada bhi dikh raha hai par usme do hi show ho raha hai ink cartridge aur drum unit.
Sir vo to sir vaise aapko dikh raha hoga uske bagal mein dekhiye HP link bhi likh raha hai aapko. Drum unit ke aage. Drum unit ke aage dekhiye likha hai HP link.
Only ink cartridge aur drum unit likha hai sir. Nahi drum unit ke aage dekhenge to HP link karke aa raha hai. HP fir ink cartridge ke aage likh kya raha hai HP black ink cartridge.
Nahi aa raha hai sir isme nahi hai.
Main to aapka portal khol ke baitha hun sir. Mere mein to aapka pura sab kuch show ho raha hai. Category mein.
Vahi na sir aap buylead pe gaye hoge, relevant pe hoge na? Kahan pe ho aap? Relevant page pe hi hoge na?
Ha recent mein tha recent mein nahi nahi relevant relevant pe jaiye. Relevant pe jaiye. Ha relevant pe gaya. Isme dikh raha hai. Dekhiye category mein sara dikh raha hai.
Ab recent ka matlab ye hota hai sir aap jo jo buylead use karoge na sir uske hisab se vo vahan pe recent mein add hota jayega. Abhi ho sakta hai aapne do do product se related buylead use kiya ho uske. Hai na?
Ji. Isliye aapko vahi dono show ho raha hai recent pe. Relevant pe aapko pura dikhega jo jo category aapne lagai rakhi hai.
To usme kya vo recent ka usme jata hai na direct isme thodi aata hai. Nahi main samajh raha hun aapki baat par recent pe vahi category jayegi unki buylead aap use kar rahe ho. Ab recent pe aap buylead sir product ka naam likh ke na upar aapko search karna padega. Kyunki aap IndiaMART pe aapka consumption behavior jab tak nahi banega tab tak buylead mein thodi si issue aayegi sir aapko. Thik hai? Ek baar jab system ko pata chal gaya ki aapko kaun sa product dena hai, kaun sa product nahi dena hai to vo chije bilkul sahi ho jayengi sir.
Thik hai.
Thik hai? Sir main aapka ye jo concern tha buylead nahi aa rahi bilkul bhi zero aapko dikh raha tha na ek bhi dikh hi nahi raha tha. Vo thoda sa aap active rahiye aur aapke paas koi ho sir jankat usse kahiye ki aapke chrome pe auto refresher laga de.
Vo laga diya. Isse kya hoga? Laga diya hai na sir?
Ji sir. To vo buylead aapko barabar refresh hoke aati rahegi.
Ji sir. Main sir aapka ye jo concern tha use close kar raha hun buylead nahi aa rahi hai uske liye mera mere feedback rahega. Abhi ek call laga Arif Choudhary karke usse baat hua mera.
Nahi nahi aapka thik hai main Bhavyakant jo aapka account sambhal rahe unka manager baat kar raha hun sir. Maine bhi dekha tumse maine kaha band karne se pahle feedback le lun aapse. Vahi feedback le raha tha. Sir aapko mere naam ka ek feedback jayega abhi thik hai? Aap mujhse satisfied hai ya nahi? Aage sir koi issue hua to main apna number main de deta hun aapko. Whatsapp pe hi hi kar deta hun sir aap us time pe turant whatsapp aur call mujhe us number pe aap kar lijiyega sir. Thik hai?
Thik hai.
Bhavyakant ka number to hoga hi aapke paas?
Vo hai par sir uska nahi hai matlab vo nahi call bhi nahi hai vo sham ko maine kal call kiya tha.
Hmm. To kyuki kal vahi ho raha tha sir kyuki kal sham tak vo show nahi ho raha tha buylead. Achcha.
To sir maine usko bola to vo nahi baat hi nahi kar raha tha vo bola main baat nahi karta hun abhi. Sham ko aapne phone kiya tha Bhavyakant ne baat nahi kiya tha?
Nahi sir vo baad mein bola. Sir aapne baat bagal mein baitha puchh raha hun to kah raha hai bike chala raha tha sir raat ko phone kar rahe the. To baad mein. Sir 7 baje se pehle sir phone kariye customer na uthaye uske baad mujhe bataiye.
Thik hai sir.
Thik hai? Sir aap please mujhe satisfied mark kariyega thik hai?
Thik hai aap mere ko whatsapp karo main aapko call karta hun bas. Thik sir, okay. Okay. Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Category option not showing while picking buyleads.

- Images not added to the products.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed buyleads are visible on portal.

- Executive explained how relevant buyleads work.

- Suggested to add auto refresher on chrome.

- Executive offered his WhatsApp number for future issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will mark executive as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, images, products, portal
